Come families ye of all shapes and sizes.
Come mothers, come fathers in search of surprises.
Come little ones, too, with your eyes full of wonder.
Our story is here, and it's yours for the plunder.
No knives or forks, just good food in hand.
Food that is grown, picked and born of our land.
When you pass through our doors in your own special way,...
...we hope that McDonald's will help make your day.
